```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(USAboundaries)
library(mappingelections)
map_id <- "meae.congressional.congress19.national.county"
```

<div class="map">

```{r election-map, echo = FALSE}
map_id %>%
  get_national_map_data() %>%
  filter(id != "als_nca6",
         id != "als_nca7",
         id != "als_nca8",
         id != "als_nca9",
         id != "als_nca11",
         id != "als_nca12",
         id != "als_nca13") %>% 
  filter(id != "gas_nca") %>%
  filter(id != "ils_nca2",
         id != "ils_nca3",
         id != "ils_nca4",
         id != "ils_nca5") %>% 
  filter(id != "ins_nca4",
         id != "ins_nca6") %>%
  filter(!is.na(state_abbr),
          cross_ref != "New to dataset") %>%
  arrange(!is.na(federalist_percentage), !is.na(demrep_percentage), 
          cnty_type == "Parish") %>%         
  filter(id != "mos_nca1",
         id != "mos_nca3",
         id != "mos_nca4",
         id != "mos_nca6",
         id != "mos_nca7",
         id != "mos_nca8",
         id != "mos_nca9",
         id != "mos_nca10") %>% 
  filter(id != "mss_nca1") %>% 
  arrange(!is.na(federalist_percentage), !is.na(demrep_percentage), 
          !is.na(jacksonian_percentage), cnty_type == "District") %>%         
  map_national(congress = 19)
```
